item.title: By: nathan
item.dc:creator: nathan
item.content:encoded:
Looking north across the intersection of Sixth and Fig, 1957. The Jonathan Club on the left, behind that, the Carlton. The marquis at right, the Gates Hotel.

But the reason we’re here is ’cause of what’s lurking in the background…

…the black ’54 Packard coming at us is pretty cool too.

USC Digital Archives

item.title: By: nathan
item.dc:creator: nathan
item.content:encoded: Bless the United States Postal Service and their ability to bring me treats from eBay. So that I may share one of those with you, the greater congregation of those interested in yet another image of the Monarch. (Jeeps, maybe someday there may even be enough of y’all to form a minyan.)
